title: Can Blitzcrank's Lancer skins get a louder Q sound effect?
body:
Basically what the title says.

Blitzcrank's default skin has a loud and distinct sound effect when using his Q. It's clearly recognizable, even with a lot of noise. However, I think the Q sound effects of the Lancer skins are too quiet or don't stand out enough to quickly react to. 
I usually don't have any problems spellshielding allies as Morgana when they're about to get hit, but I found myself struggling greatly to do that against the Lancer Rougue skin, even when deliberately trying to bait out the hook (I assume Lancer Paragons sound effect is similar).

I would deeply appreciate it if somebody from Riot could look into it and maybe adjust the volume levels.

replies.body:
Hey DerMangoJoghurt! I'll take a look at adjusting volume levels here - the audio levels between the these Lancer Q's and the base Blitz Q are actually pretty similar, but the base Blitz Q is definitely pretty high pitched and instantly recognizable, especially since that's such an iconic spell too. 

Looking through his kit, I'll make some volume tweaks to see if it'll help!
